meanings.definition: The sport of riding on a short, wide board while being towed behind a motorboat.
meanings.sent1: Wakeboarding is a fun water activity.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy wakeboarding on the lake during the summer.
meanings.sent3: After a few falls, I finally got the hang of wakeboarding.
meanings.sent4: In the world of watersports, wakeboarding is like dancing on waves.
meanings.sent5: The thrill of wakeboarding is unmatched by any other water sport.

meanings.definition: The act of participating in the sport of wakeboarding.
meanings.sent1: She won a medal for her wakeboarding skills.
meanings.sent2: Many people gather at the lake for wakeboarding competitions.
meanings.sent3: His passion for wakeboarding led him to travel to different countries.
meanings.sent4: In the community, wakeboarding is a symbol of freedom and adventure.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the motorboat signals the start of wakeboarding fun.
